pages.text: Beastmaster is an ability that lets gems tame up to five wolves to their side. If the gem is a rebel, they will turn their wolves aggressive to attack nearby players.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)N/A$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Jasper$(li)Agate
